content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE X: 10 Years Anniversary*** was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on March 26, 2022, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background On 27 October 2021, CEO [Chatri Sityodtong](/wiki/Chatri_Sityodtong) broke the news that ONE: X would be postponed to early 2022, owing to a recent surge in the [COVID-19 pandemic in Singapore](/wiki/COVID-19_pandemic_in_Singapore). The event was later rescheduled for March 26, 2022. A Special-Rules bout between current [ONE Flyweight Muay Thai World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Flyweight_World_Championship) [Rodtang Jitmuangnon](/wiki/Rodtang_Jitmuangnon) and former [UFC Flyweight Champion](/wiki/UFC_Flyweight_Championship) (also [2019 ONE Flyweight World Grand Prix Champion](/wiki/2019_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_Flyweight_Grand_Prix_bracket)) [Demetrious Johnson](/wiki/Demetrious_Johnson) took place at the co-main event. The contest was set for four, three-minute rounds alternating between Muay Thai and MMA rules. The fight started under Muay Thai rules and switched to MMA for the following round. A [ONE Women's Atomweight World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Women's_Atomweight_World_Championship) bout between current champion [Angela Lee](/wiki/Angela_Lee) and former [ONE Women's Atomweight Muay Thai](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Women's_Atomweight_Muay_Thai_World_Championship) and [Kickboxing World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Women's_Atomweight_Kickboxing_World_Championship) (also [2021 ONE Women's Atomweight World Grand Prix Champion](/wiki/2021_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_Women's_Atomweight_Grand_Prix_bracket)) [Stamp Fairtex](/wiki/Stamp_Fairtex) headlined the event. [ONE Bantamweight Muay Thai World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Bantamweight_World_Championship) [Nong-O Gaiyanghadao](/wiki/Nong-O_Gaiyanghadao) was scheduled to defend his title against former ONE Bantamweight Kickboxing World Champion [Alaverdi Ramazanov](/wiki/Alaverdi_Ramazanov). However, Because of the [Russian invasion of Ukraine](/wiki/Russian_invasion_of_Ukraine), Ramazanov was replaced with the Brazilian Felipe Lobo. [John Wayne Parr](/wiki/John_Wayne_Parr) faced former two-time [ONE Lightweight World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Lightweight_Worlx_Championship) [Eduard Folayang](/wiki/Eduard_Folayang) in Wushu vs. Muay Thai legends fight and It's the last fight of Parr in professional competition. [Shinya Aoki](/wiki/Shinya_Aoki) and [Yoshihiro Akiyama](/wiki/Yoshihiro_Akiyama) faced one another at ONE X in a clash of Japanese MMA legends. Top Filipino strawweights Lito Adiwang and Jeremy Miado faced each other at this event. A rematch between [Seo Hee Ham](/wiki/Seo_Hee_Ham) and [Denice Zamboanga](/wiki/Denice_Zamboanga) was also booked for the event. A featherweight fight between Amir Khan and Ryogo Takahashi was added to the ONE: X card. Reinier de Ridder and [Andre Galvao](/wiki/Andre_Galvao) met in a submission grappling match. The American Danielle Kelly made her debut at ONE X in an atomweight submission grappling match against Japanese veteran [Mei Yamaguchi](/wiki/Mei_Yamaguchi). [Nieky Holzken](/wiki/Nieky_Holzken) was scheduled to face Islam Murtazaev in a fight between two top lightweight Kickboxing contenders. Shoko Sato was to meet Yusup Saadulaev in a battle of formerly ranked bantamweight contenders. The card also featured Ryuto Sawada and Senzo Ikeda, who meet in a strawweight contest. However, due to the [2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine](/wiki/2022_Russian_invasion_of_Ukraine), all Russian athletes were removed from the card as a result of the Singaporean government banning them from entering the country. As a result, Murtazaev was replaced by [Sinsamut Klinmee](/wiki/Sinsamut_Klinmee) and Yusup Saadulaev was replaced by Stephen Loman. [Alyse Anderson](/wiki/Alyse_Anderson) was scheduled to fight with Indian striker Asha Roka. However, Anderson withdraw from the bout for medical reasons and the fight was rescheduled for [ONE 157](/wiki/ONE_157). ## Results Grand Finale (PPV on Watch ONE)Weight
